sentences.en: A map and a bird-watchers' field checklist are available at the front desk.
sentences.cn: 前台有地图和观鸟地点一览表可供拿取。

sentences.en: A printed checklist was provided, undue haste forbidden.
sentences.cn: 有一张印刷的供核对用的清单, 严禁仓促行事.

sentences.en: A weekly inspection checklist will be completed by the Medical Staff.
sentences.cn: 由医疗人员填写每周的检查清单.

sentences.en: Also, I would like to see a checklist for TCO analysis.
sentences.cn: 此外, 我想要见到一张TCO分析的检查表.

sentences.en: Before every scene he ran down his checklist of props.
sentences.cn: 每场戏之前他都要浏览一遍他的道具清单.

sentences.en: Before you continue, review the checklist for creating a network.
sentences.cn: 继续下一步之前, 请参阅“创建网络的清单”.

sentences.en: But the WHO says use the checklist increased that to 68 %.
sentences.cn: 但是世界卫生组织说清单的使用增加到68%.

sentences.en: By starting a product sheet and going through the checklist of items.
sentences.cn: 开始先做一张产品卡,把列有各项内容的这份一览表审阅一遍.

sentences.en: Make a checklist of the tools and materials you will need.
sentences.cn: 把你需要的工具和材料开一张单子。

sentences.en: Obtain a Preinstallation Checklist From the Instrument Manufacturer and Follow It.
sentences.cn: 安装设备时,要有厂商供给的设备清单、安装指引.

sentences.en: See the general checklist at the beginning of this chapter.
sentences.cn: 请参阅本章开头的总清单.

sentences.en: The following is a checklist to help you determine when it's time to move on.
sentences.cn: 下面是一些帮助你决定什么时候该行动的检验列表.

sentences.en: The guide contains a useful checklist of points to look for when buying a car.
sentences.cn: 手册里有一张很有用的清单，列出买车时要注意的一些事项。

sentences.en: Using agency format ( preoperative checklist ), complete all essential information.
sentences.cn: 采用机构表格 ( 术前目录单 ), 填写全部重要信息.

sentences.en: VAT in the checklist should be used VAT audit, investigation of information.
sentences.cn: 在核对增值税专用发票时应使用增值税专用发票稽核 、 协查信息.

sentences.en: You know what happened when I burned my perfect man checklist.
sentences.cn: 你知道当我烧掉完美人清单时发生了什么事吗?

words.tran_cn: 检查（check的过去式和过去分词）
清单；检查表；备忘录；目录册

trans.tran_cn: 清单，检查表，备忘录，目录册
trans.tran_en: a list that helps you by reminding you of the things you need to do or get for a particular job or activity
